thread.title: Ann Cantello

author: Ann Cantello
title: Ann Cantello
text: I am not computer literate but cannot get what I want, which is to use a headset and microphone and connect to babble. IF I do not use mic I can hear the pronunciation but not communicate. If I give consent to access my mic I hear nothing, only see script. I have be a member for a week and am frustrated not to be able to communicate and remedy this problem.
